description: This file is a shell script that configures wireless interfaces, manages hostapd processes, updates network configurations, and starts services such as dnsmasq and lighttpd in a router or access point environment.

methods.name: Restart_Hostapd
methods.description: Restarts the hostapd service on the 2.4 GHz interface, killing existing processes and starting hostapd with the designated config.

methods.name: Restart_Hostapd_5G
methods.description: Restarts the hostapd service on the 5 GHz interface by reloading kernel modules and reinitializing hostapd.

methods.name: Hostapd_Restart
methods.description: Restarts the hostapd service without module reloading, mainly for troubleshooting or recovery.
